src:
欧冠-梅西中柱比达尔进球被吹 巴萨0-0斯拉维亚

07 Nov 2019, 03:00

【网易体育6日讯】19/20赛季欧冠小组赛F组第4轮开战。在诺坎普球场，巴塞罗那主场0-0战平布拉格斯拉维亚。梅西世界波击中横梁，比达尔打进一球但被吹为越位，阿尔巴因伤离场。在欧冠历史上，两队只交锋过一次，巴萨首回合客场2-1获胜。苏亚雷斯因伤休战，托迪波、阿图尔、瓦格和菲尔波落选大名单。巴塞罗那(4-3-3)：1-特尔施特根/2-塞梅多、3-皮克、15-朗格莱、18-阿尔巴(46;20-塞尔吉-罗贝托)/22-比达尔、5-布斯克茨(68’4-拉基蒂奇)、21-德容/11-登贝莱(65’31-法蒂)、10-梅西、17-格列兹曼。布拉格斯拉维亚(4-2-3-1)：1-科拉什/5-库法尔、15-库德拉、25-弗雷德里奇、18-博利尔/22-索切克、27-特拉奥雷(57’11-特茨)/23-塞弗齐科、7-斯坦丘(63’10-胡斯堡)、9-奥莱因卡/28-马索普斯特(82’17-普罗沃德)。
text:
Champions League - Messi midfielder Vidal scored to be blown Barcelona 0-0 Slavia

07 Nov 2019, 03:00

[Netease Sports 6th News] The 19th/20th season of the Champions League Group F Group 4 started. At the Camp Nou, Barcelona home 0-0 draw with Prague Slavia. Messi World wave hit the crossbar, Vidal scored a goal but was blown offside, and Alba left the field with injury. In the history of the Champions League, the two teams only played once, and Barcelona won 2-1 away in the first round. Suarez suffered a truce because of injury, Todipo, Artur, Wagga and Philpo were unsuccessful. Barcelona (4-3-3): 1-telstegen/2-Semedo, 3-Pique, 15-Langley, 18-Alba (46; 20-Cergy-Roberto) ) / 22 - Vidal, 5-Busquets (68'4-Rakitic), 21-De Jong / 11 - Dembele (65'31-Fati), 10 Messi, 17-di Lezman. Prague Slavia (4-2-3-1): 1-Corash/5-Kufar, 15-Kuda, 25-Fredridge, 18-Bolier/22-Sochek 27- Traore (57'11-Tates)/23-Sefzizi, 7-Stanchu (63'10-Hussburg), 9-Oleinka/28-Matsops Special (82'17-Provod).
